enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: A global toggle for the mod.

hide-difficulty-in-level-screen.name: Hide Difficulty in Level Screen
hide-difficulty-in-level-screen.description: Hides the standard difficulty (easy, hard, demon) in level screens.

hide-rate-demon-button.name: Hide Rate Demon Button
hide-rate-demon-button.description: Hides the rate demon button on hidden demon levels.

only-hide-uncompleted-levels.name: Only Hide Uncompleted Levels
only-hide-uncompleted-levels.description: Only hide the difficulties and stars of uncompleted levels.
